flowers.name: Cafe au Lait
flowers.description: A stunning dinner plate dahlia with soft peachy-pink petals that fade to cream at the edges. This variety is known for its massive blooms and strong stems, making it perfect for both garden display and cut flower arrangements.

flowers.name: Bishop of Llandaff
flowers.description: A striking dahlia with vibrant red single flowers and dramatic dark bronze foliage. This heritage variety dates back to 1924 and remains one of the most popular dahlias for its bold color contrast and reliable performance.

flowers.name: Labyrinth
flowers.description: An enchanting decorative dahlia with intricate layered petals in shades of burgundy and purple. The complex petal formation creates a mesmerizing pattern that draws the eye and makes this variety a true garden showstopper.

flowers.name: Black Jack
flowers.description: A dramatic semi-cactus dahlia with deep burgundy petals so dark they appear almost black. The pointed petals and rich color make this variety perfect for creating sophisticated color schemes and adding depth to any garden design.

flowers.name: Orange Cushion
flowers.description: A cheerful ball dahlia with perfectly round, densely packed petals in bright orange. This compact variety is excellent for borders and containers, producing numerous blooms throughout the growing season.

flowers.name: Salmon Runner
flowers.description: An elegant waterlily dahlia with soft salmon-pink petals that have a gentle gradient from darker centers to lighter edges. The flat, layered petals resemble a waterlily floating on water, hence the classification name.
